==Events==
*[[52 BC]] &ndash; [[Vercingetorix]], leader of the Gauls, surrenders to the Romans under [[Julius Caesar]], ending the siege and [[Battle of Alesia]].
*[[42 BC]] &ndash; [[Battle of Philippi|First Battle of Philippi]]: [[Second Triumvirate|Triumvirs]] [[Mark Antony]] and [[Augustus|Octavian]] fight a decisive battle with Caesar's assassins [[Marcus Junius Brutus|Brutus]] and [[Gaius Cassius Longinus|Cassius]].
* [[382]] &ndash; Roman Emperor [[Theodosius I]] concludes a [[peace treaty]] with the [[Goths]] and settles them in the [[Balkans]] in exchange for military service.
*[[1283]] &ndash; [[Dafydd ap Gruffydd]], prince of [[Gwynedd]] in Wales, is the first nobleman to be executed by  [[hanged, drawn and quartered|hanging, drawing and quartering]].
*[[1574]] &ndash; The [[Siege of Leiden]] is lifted by the [[Watergeuzen]].
*[[1683]] &ndash; The [[Qing Dynasty]] naval commander [[Shi Lang]] reaches [[Taiwan]] (under the [[Kingdom of Tungning]]) to receive the formal surrender of [[Zheng Keshuang]] and Liu Guoxuan after the [[Battle of Penghu]].
*[[1712]] &ndash; The [[James Graham, 1st Duke of Montrose|Duke of Montrose]] issues a warrant for the arrest of [[Rob Roy MacGregor]].
*[[1739]] &ndash; The [[Treaty of Niš (1739)|Treaty of Nissa]] is signed by the [[Ottoman Empire]] and Russia at the end of the Russian-Turkish War, 1736–1739.
*[[1778]] &ndash; Captain [[James Cook]] anchors in Alaska.
*[[1789]] &ndash; [[George Washington]] makes the first [[Thanksgiving (United States)|Thanksgiving Day]] designated by the national government of the [[United States|United States of America]].
*[[1835]] &ndash; The [[Staedtler|Staedtler Company]] is founded in [[Nuremberg]], Germany.
*[[1849]] &ndash; American author [[Edgar Allan Poe]] is found delirious in a gutter in [[Baltimore]], [[Maryland]] under mysterious circumstances; it is the last time he is seen in public before his [[Death of Edgar Allan Poe|death]].
*[[1863]] &ndash; The last Thursday in [[November]] is declared as [[Thanksgiving (United States)|Thanksgiving Day]] by [[President of the United States|President]] [[Abraham Lincoln]] as are Thursdays, November 30, 1865 and November 29, 1866.
*[[1872]] &ndash; The Bloomingdale brothers opened their first [[Bloomingdales|store]] at 938 Third Avenue, New York City.
*[[1873]] &ndash; [[Kintpuash|Captain Jack]] and companions are hanged for their part in the [[Modoc War]].
*[[1912]] &ndash; U.S. forces defeat Nicaraguan rebels under the command of [[Benjamín Zeledón]] at the [[Battle of Coyotepe Hill]].
*[[1918]] &ndash; King [[Boris III of Bulgaria]] accedes to the throne.
*[[1919]] &ndash; [[Cincinnati Reds]] pitcher [[Adolfo Luque]] becomes the first Latin player to appear in a [[1919 World Series|World Series]].
*[[1929]] &ndash; The [[Kingdom of Serbs, Croats and Slovenes]] is renamed to [[Kingdom of Yugoslavia]], "Land of the South Slavs".
*[[1932]] &ndash; [[Iraq]] gains independence from the United Kingdom.
*[[1935]] &ndash; [[Second Italo-Abyssinian War]]: Italy [[De Bono's invasion of Abyssinia|invades]] [[Ethiopia]] under [[Emilio De Bono|General de Bono]].
*[[1942]] &ndash; [[Spaceflight]]: The first successful launch of a V-2 /[[V-2 rocket|A4-rocket]] from [[Test Stand VII]] at [[Peenemünde]], Germany. It is the first man-made object to reach space.
*[[1949]] &ndash; [[WERD]], the 1st black-owned radio station in the [[United States]], opens in [[Atlanta|Atlanta, Georgia]].
*[[1950]] &ndash; [[Korean War]]: The [[First Battle of Maryang San]], primarily pitting Australian and British forces against communist China, begins.
*[[1952]] &ndash; The United Kingdom [[Operation Hurricane|successfully tests]] a [[nuclear weapon]] to become the world's third nuclear power.
*[[1955]] &ndash; [[The Mickey Mouse Club]] debuts on [[American Broadcasting Company|ABC]].
*[[1957]] &ndash; [[Allen Ginsberg]]'s ''[[Howl|Howl and Other Poems]]'' is ruled to be not obscene by the [[Superior Courts of California|California State Superior Court]].
*[[1961]] &ndash; [[The Dick Van Dyke Show]] premieres on [[CBS|CBS-TV]] in the United States.
*[[1962]] &ndash; [[Project Mercury]]: [[Mercury-Atlas 8|Sigma 7]] is launched from [[Cape Canaveral]], with [[Astronaut]] [[Wally Schirra]] aboard, for a six-orbit, nine-hour flight.
*[[1963]] &ndash; [[1963 Honduran coup d'état|A violent coup in Honduras]] pre-empts the October 13 election, ends a period of reform, and begins two decades of military rule.
*[[1964]] &ndash; First [[Buffalo Wings]] are made at the [[Anchor Bar]] in Buffalo, New York.
*[[1981]] &ndash; The [[1981 Irish Hunger Strike|hunger strike]] by [[Provisional Irish Republican Army]] and [[Irish National Liberation Army]] prisoners at the Maze Prison in [[Northern Ireland]] ends after seven months and ten deaths.
*[[1985]] &ndash; The [[Space Shuttle Atlantis]] makes its maiden flight. (Mission [[STS-51-J]]).
*[[1986]] &ndash; [[TASCC]], a [[superconducting]] [[cyclotron]] at the [[Chalk River Laboratories]], is officially opened.
*[[1990]] &ndash; [[German reunification]]. The [[East Germany|German Democratic Republic]] ceases to exist and its territory becomes part of the [[Germany|Federal Republic of Germany]]. East German citizens became part of the ''[[European Community]]'', which later became the [[European Union]]. Now celebrated as [[German Unity Day]].
*[[1993]] &ndash; [[Battle of Mogadishu (1993)|Battle of Mogadishu]]: In a failed attempt to capture officials of warlord [[Mohamed Farrah Aidid]]'s organisation in [[Mogadishu, Somalia]], 18 U.S. soldiers and about 1,000 Somalis are killed in heavy fighting.
*[[1995]] &ndash; [[O. J. Simpson]] is [[O. J. Simpson murder case|acquitted]] of the murders of [[Nicole Brown Simpson]] and [[Ronald Goldman]].
*[[2008]] &ndash; The [[Emergency Economic Stabilization Act of 2008]] for the U.S. financial system is signed by President [[George W. Bush]].
*[[2009]] &ndash; The presidents of [[Azerbaijan]], [[Kazakhstan]], [[Kyrgyzstan]], and [[Turkey]] sign the Nakhchivan Agreement on the Establishment of [[Turkic Council]].
*[[2013]] &ndash; At least 134 migrants are killed when their boat [[2013 Mediterranean Sea migrant shipwreck|sinks]] near the Italian island of [[Lampedusa]].
*2013 &ndash; [[The Gambia]] withdraws from the [[Commonwealth of Nations]].
